name: Unused Imports
description: Không import các module hoặc symbol không sử dụng

violations.code:
import { Order } from './models/Order';

// Order is never used
violations.reason: Imported 'Order' but never used in the code

violations.code:
import * as utils from './utils';

// utils namespace is never used

valid.code:
import { User } from './models/User';

const user = new User();

import type { Order } from './types';

const order: Order = { id: 1 };
valid.reason: Type import is used in type annotation

valid.code:
import { _debugHelper } from './utils';

// Allowed: starts with underscore
valid.reason: Import starting with _ is allowed as intentionally unused

suggestions: Remove unused imports to keep code clean
Use IDE auto-import features to avoid manual imports
Prefix intentionally unused imports with underscore (_)
